channel.title: CVE Feed for Kajitori Co.,Ltd -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kajitori Co.,Ltd -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-38080|2024-08-03T10:45:52.407Z -- kajitori%20co.%2Cltd -- exment
item.description: Reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability in Exment ((PHP8) exceedone/exment v5.0.2 and earlier and exceedone/laravel-admin v3.0.0 and earlier, (PHP7) exceedone/exment v4.4.2 and earlier and exceedone/laravel-admin v2.2.2 and earlier) allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2022-37333|2024-08-03T10:29:20.932Z -- kajitori%20co.%2Cltd -- exment
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in the Exment ((PHP8) exceedone/exment v5.0.2 and earlier and exceedone/laravel-admin v3.0.0 and earlier, (PHP7) exceedone/exment v4.4.2 and earlier and exceedone/laravel-admin v2.2.2 and earlier) allows remote authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-38089|2024-08-03T10:45:52.456Z -- kajitori%20co.%2Cltd -- exment
item.description: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in Exment ((PHP8) exceedone/exment v5.0.2 and earlier and exceedone/laravel-admin v3.0.0 and earlier, (PHP7) exceedone/exment v4.4.2 and earlier and exceedone/laravel-admin v2.2.2 and earlier) allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.
